descriptionBeats.text: The ${locationMain.label} consists of two main areas: ${roomEntrance.label} (Area A), the entrance foyer where visitors first arrive, and ${roomStorage.label} (Area B), a larger storage area deeper inside. A narrow corridor connects these two spaces, creating the only path between them. The chaos erupted in Area A, but the baby disappeared from Area B.
The ${locationMain.label} buzzed with visitors when a group arrived with a baby in a ${stroller.label}.
Screams erupted near ${roomEntrance.label}; people rushed out from ${roomStorage.label} to check what happened.
Moments later, the baby was gone. In the stroller lay a ${blanketInStroller.color} blanket; a ${blanketNearExit.color} one was later found near the exit.

preIncident.text: A woman dressed in black entered earlier and kept to herself.

initialClues.title: Family Relations
initialClues.text: ${suspects.A.name} and ${suspects.B.name} remarried after previous divorces; tension still exists between them.

initialClues.title: Past Miscarriages
initialClues.text: ${suspects.D.name} suffered multiple miscarriages years before; neighbors said she avoided children since.

initialClues.title: Arrival Times
initialClues.text: Visitor logs show ${suspects.A.name} entered ${locationMain.label} at 14:10, ${decoyVisitor.name} at 13:30, and ${supportActor.name} at 14:15.

initialClues.title: Sequence of Sounds
initialClues.text: Security audio caught two screams: one at ${timeWindow.start} near ${roomEntrance.label}, another at ${timeWindow.end} near ${roomStorage.label}.

initialClues.title: Blanket Colors
initialClues.text: A ${blanketInStroller.color} blanket was left in the ${stroller.label}, but a ${blanketNearExit.color} one was recovered at the exit.

initialClues.title: Stroller Build
initialClues.text: The ${stroller.label} was modified with a false bottom compartment.

initialClues.title: Police Call Record
initialClues.text: ${suspects.B.name} contacted the police at 14:27, minutes after the first scream.

initialClues.title: Witness Argument
initialClues.text: A visitor recalls hearing ${supportActor.name} shouting at ${suspects.A.name} moments before the baby went missing.

clue.title: Financial Strain
clue.text: Bank records show ${suspects.A.name} recently withdrew savings to buy a new stroller.

clue.title: False Pregnancy Rumor
clue.text: Former colleagues claim ${suspects.D.name} once lied about being pregnant to keep her marriage stable.

clue.title: Camera Blind Spot
clue.text: Security footage between ${timeWindow.start} and ${timeWindow.end} went dark in ${roomStorage.label}.

clue.text: A powder similar to sedatives was detected inside ${suspects.D.name}’s handbag.

clue.title: Hidden Latch
clue.text: Inspectors found a hidden latch under the ${stroller.label} handle, suggesting premeditation.

clue.title: Conflicting Story
clue.text: ${suspects.C.name} claimed ${suspects.D.name} stayed with him, but another witness saw her leaving toward ${roomStorage.label}.

clue.title: Woman in Black’s Statement
clue.text: ${decoyVisitor.name} said she saw someone hiding an object shaped like a baby under a coat near ${roomStorage.label}.

${supportActor.name} attacked ${suspects.A.name} near ${roomEntrance.label} at about ${timeWindow.start}.
${suspects.C.name} tended to ${suspects.A.name}'s injuries while ${suspects.D.name} was out of sight.

descriptionBeats.text: A violent storm cut off all outside contact at Blackwood Manor. Inside ${locationMain.label}, ${victim.name} was found dead at midnight, stabbed with an antique dagger.
Lightning destroyed the phone lines. No one could enter or leave between ${timeWindow.start} and ${timeWindow.end}. All four guests became suspects.
Each suspect carried secrets, debts, or past humiliations connected to ${victim.name}. The truth lies within their conflicting stories.

descriptionBeats.text: A violent snowstorm sealed off the mountain roads. Inside ${locationMain.label}, ${victim.name} was found dead, struck from behind with a heavy object.
The storm cut all communication lines. Between ${timeWindow.start} and ${timeWindow.end}, no one could enter or leave the lodge.
Four guests—all close to ${victim.name}—shared the lodge that night. Old debts, broken promises, and wounded pride came to a deadly peak.
